result.arabic_text: قُل لَّا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡخَبِيثُ وَٱلطَّيِّبُ وَلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَكَ كَثۡرَةُ ٱلۡخَبِيثِۚ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ
result.translation: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ikibi ntigihwanye n’icyiza kabone n’ubwo wareshywa n’ubwinshi bw’ibibi.” Bityo yemwe banyabwenge, nimugandukire Allah kugira ngo mukiranuke.
